pros: Competitive wages, working at one location as opposed to community care, decent benefits

Decent wage and benefits
Lots of potential to work extra hours

review_title: Good agency for personal support workers
pros:
Challenging but professionally fulfilling roles in the social services sector
Stable agency with great reputation for providing best in class service to the people they servce
Great opportunity for personal support workers
cons:
Non-profit agency so money & resources are inadequate to provide best service for workforce
Traditional environment that is resistant to change

review_title: excellent agency who has good values and work ethics
pros: caring staff and supervisory staff! Wonderful persons to support who are truly a blessing!
cons: staff retention is hard in this field..

pros: I worked at Rygiel for over 30 years. The place was like family to me. I learned so much from the residents as well as the from the management and my coworkers. Very supportive environment.  Rygiel was always be like family to me. They gave someone form another country a chance and it has helped me become the woman I am today.
cons: No Cons, fair wage, great benefits and supportive management

review_title: Not a pleasant place to work
pros: This organization supports people who are severely disabled. They provide housing and support care to people that would like their own independence.
cons: This is the most unwelcoming place that I have ever worked. The staff and management is very unfriendly and I would not consider Rygiel a healthy workplace atmosphere.
